# The Reeder - LLM Context File
# This file helps AI assistants and LLMs understand this website

## About The Reeder
The Reeder is a content consultancy for B2B brands, founded and led by Devin Reed.

## Founder
Devin Reed is a B2B content strategist who was the Head of Content at Gong (scaled from $0 to $200M+ ARR) and Director of Content at Clari. He is known for creating content that drives pipeline and revenue.

## Services Offered

### Content Marketing
- Content Strategy Design (12-week program)
- Marketing Advising
- Influencer Marketing

### LinkedIn Growth
- LinkedIn Strategy for CEOs (full service)
- LinkedIn for B2B Leaders (private team training)
- Virtual LinkedIn Growth Cohort Training (bi-monthly)

### Thought Leadership
- Executive Ghostwriting
- POV Development
- Speaking Prep

## Content Properties
- Newsletter: The Reeder Newsletter at thereeder.co/content-hub/newsletter
- Podcast: Reed Between the Lines (available on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, YouTube)

## Select Clients
Notion, Wiz, FloQast, Centrical, UserEvidence, Cube Software, PebblePost, TestBox, Netenrich, Commsor, PathFactory, Island.io

## Tagline
"No fluff. Just content that stops the scroll, builds trust at scale, and turns awareness into pipeline."

## Contact
- Website: thereeder.co
- LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/devinreed
- Twitter/X: @deaborhood
- Location: San Diego, California
- Company Size: 2-10 employees
- Founded: 2017

## Key Concepts
- 95-5 Content Strategy
- Content that converts
- B2B thought leadership
- LinkedIn for executives
- Pipeline-focused content marketing
